root.name: Doraemon Memories: Nobi Dai no Omoi Izaru Daibouken
root.description: OverviewDoraemon Memories: Nobi Dai no Omoi Izaru Daibouken is an Action/Platforming game developed and published by Epoch for the Game Boy Color platform. Doraemon Memories: Nobi Dai no Omoi Izaru Daibouken was never released outside of Japan.
